titleStmt.title: The sence of the Oxford-Iunto, concerning the late treaty wherein the severall reasons are delivered, why they could not conclude a peace with the Parliament: and published for the satisfaction of the whole kingdome.

notesStmt.note: "Very rare. Each prominent person at Oxford is represented as in turn giving a reason why the Uxbridge Conference came to nothing.." Cf. Madan.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
